org.openscience.cdk.config
Class ElementPTFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.openscience.cdk.config.ElementPTFactory

@TestClass(value="org.openscience.cdk.config.ElementPTFactoryTest")
public class ElementPTFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Used to store and return data of a particular chemicalElement. As this class is a singleton class, one gets an instance with: 

   ElementPTFactory efac = ElementPTFactory.getInstance();

Author:
Miguel Rojas
Created on:
May 8, 2005
Belongs to CDK module:
extra
Source code:

Parameters:

Returns:
The configured PeriodicTableElement
Throws:
CDKException - if there is an error during configuration (such as invalid IUPAC group number)
